snippet: A clause in the N.H.L.’s contract with the University of Michigan would allow the league to cancel the Winter Classic as late as the day of the game.
abstract: A clause in the NHL’s contract with the University of Michigan would allow the league to cancel the Winter Classic as late as the day of the game, because of a work stoppage stemming from labor dispute.
lead_paragraph: A clause in the N.H.L.’s contract with the University of Michigan would allow the league to cancel the Winter Classic as late as the day of the game.

headline.seo: In Case of Lockout, N.H.L. Has Leeway on Winter Classic
headline.main: A Clause That Could Salvage the Winter Classic
headline.print_headline: A Clause That Could Salvage The Classic
